content: Today is the United Nations Women in Science Day. To celebrate it we are relaunching our directories of Women in Logic and Women in Category Theory in GitHub, to facilitate updates. Directories are useful as that way people have no excuses for `manels'-- panels with only men. It's work in progress, so please help us complete it, the instructions are on the page. Thanks to @Tim Hosgood for all the help!

The 2023 AWM Research Symposium is happening this fall! 

The 2023 Symposium is taking place at Clark-Atlanta University in Atlanta, Georgia from September 30 – October 2, 2023.  

Deadlines

April 15, 2023: Propose a special session, panel, roundtable discussion, or another event.
